name: PizzaParty
description:
You are a pizza delivery person trying to deliver pizza to house party. Fight past the pizza hungry hoards to deliver the sweet pizza and earn all the money.

This game was made in 48hrs for the 2017 Global Game Jam: http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/pizzaparty

Just download the executable for your platform and run it.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Left Mouse button - pick up pizza
ESCAPE - Quit
